body_html: I think TensorFlow should probably handle this underneath rather than giving control over to the user (which would permit user-caused bugs). We probably don't do the most optimal things today but over time we hope to evolve to automatically do this.
body_text: I think TensorFlow should probably handle this underneath rather than giving control over to the user (which would permit user-caused bugs).  We probably don't do the most optimal things today but over time we hope to evolve to automatically do this.
body: I think TensorFlow should probably handle this underneath rather than giving control over to the user (which would permit user-caused bugs).  We probably don't do the most optimal things today but over time we hope to evolve to automatically do this.
